windows_move_command.trigger: move: command not found|/usr/bin/bash: line 1: move|Error move not found
windows_move_command.solution: Use mv command instead of move for Linux/Windows Git Bash

npm_permission.trigger: npm permission denied|access denied|EACCES|permission error npm
npm_permission.solution: Run as admin or use sudo npm install

init_command_misunderstanding.trigger: /init.*target folder.*create files|generate project structure in filesystem
init_command_misunderstanding.solution:
1. Understand that /init generates ANALYSIS documents in .ai/ folder, not actual project files
2. database-schema-designer → generates schema analysis in .ai/database/ folder
3. project-structure-generator → generates structure analysis in .ai/structure/ folder
4. NEVER create actual project folders/files during /init command
5. Output should be planning/analysis documents, not implementation
